attributes.action: Daniel Hannan to run for Prime Minister
attributes.additional_details: Daniel is supremely confident of the future of this country. We need to get behind this confidence and pull together as one to fight to make this country a great success. Leaving the EU was the right choice, now lets show the world how great we can be!
attributes.background:
Now more than ever the UK needs a strong leader to unite the United Kingdom to get behind the future of the UK after leaving the EU.

Listen to Daniel Hannan MEP speak on any YouTube video and agree with me that this person would be a GREAT leader to take the UK forward to a prosperous future!

rejection.details: It would be a personal matter for Mr Hannan to decide whether or not to run for Prime Minister.
